alert.note: Alert for New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:59PM CDT until July 01 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern New Madrid County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gideon, or 9 miles southeast of Malden, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Portageville, Gideon, Parma, Marston, Risco, Tallapoosa and Catron. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 32 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
